rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall that greets visitors and directs traffic towards the living areas, designed to align with Vastu guidelines ensuring proper energy flow.

An expansive living room integrated with industrial aesthetics such as exposed beams, concrete finishes, and large glass panels, maximizing natural light while ensuring compliance with local building norms.
A modern dining area adjacent to the kitchen, featuring open-plan design elements that emphasize communal interaction.
A fully-equipped industrial-style kitchen with durable materials and ample workspace, incorporating energy-efficient appliances in line with sustainable building practices.
A dedicated library space designed for quiet study and reading, with bookshelves integrated into the wall structure. The layout ensures minimal noise interference from other rooms.
One of five bedrooms on this level featuring a master suite that overlooks an outdoor terrace, complete with built-in wardrobes and Vastu-aligned positioning for enhanced tranquility.
Additional bedroom options to serve as guest rooms or family members' private spaces, designed with ample natural light and functional storage solutions.
Further bedroom space with potential dual-purpose use for home office or study room, ensuring flexibility in layout design.
Another multi-functional bedroom that can be used as a spare guest room or converted into additional living/workspace depending on requirements.

openings.description: Main entrance designed with industrial elements such as steel doors and minimalist finishes, ensuring robust security while meeting local building norms.
Large windows placed strategically in living areas to maximize natural light and ventilation, aligned with Vastu principles for optimal room energy balance.
